Get U SPORTS football drive summaries

Source: R/football_drive_summaries.R
football_drive_summaries.Rd

Get U SPORTS football drive summaries

Usage

football_drive_summaries(year = c())

Arguments

year

The season(s) of interest.

Value

A tibble.

Examples

football_drive_summaries(2018)
#> # A tibble: 3,952 × 13
